item.title: At Sea
item.description: Distress sealed in a bottle Grief cast out to sea Rolled, roiled, tumbled Returned to shore. Itâ€™s energy and strength Releases sea glass A smooth survivor Every piece unique.

item.title: In memory of....
item.description: Autumn Leaves fall around me Like memories they drift A deep rooted love Nothing will shift And strong I remain In remembrance of you
